climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Be Your Best Self on Every Video Call: Full HD 1080p webcam resolution provides natural image quality, so you look like the real you on all meeting apps
Auto Light Correction: RightLight 2.5 technology automatically compensates for poor video lighting conditions so you can be seen clearly
Sound Like You: The mono noise reduction mic suppresses background sound so everyone on the call can hear you easily
Spin for Instant Privacy: Spin the webcam privacy shutter to block the camera lens when you don’t need to be on screen
Made for Meetings: Brio Webcam 301 is compatible with most video conferencing platforms and certified for Zoom, Microsoft Teams and Google Meet
Logi Tune: Enjoy the free app (1) (2) to customize your video experiences such as adjusting color and image quality
Brio 301 is made with minimum 48% post-consumer recycled plastic for a better future (2)
This product has been certified to meet Google's compatibility standards. Google is not responsible for the operation of this product or its compliance with safety requirements.
body.description: Say hello to better video meetings. Place Brio 301 at your best angle for an eye-to-eye connection. Look natural thanks to 1080p resolution and auto light correction for low-light situations. A noise-reducing mic suppresses background noise so others can hear you clearly. Spin the easy-to-use privacy shutter to cover the lens between calls. Brio 301 is certified for Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Zoom, so you can enjoy hassle-free meetings. Add a dash of personality to your workspace with a modern shape and a subtly speckled design made from at least 48% recycled plastic. (3) (1) Download free Logi Tune for a customized experience. Logi Tune app currently supports headset voice prompts in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Portuguese. (2) Logi Tune not available for Chrome OS (3) Webcam plastic content may vary by color. Excludes Electronic (EE) Components, cables, and packaging. 62% for Graphite and Black, 48% for Off-white and Rose. (4) Bluetooth-enabled devices that support external keyboards

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STYLE MEETS SUSTAINABILITY Brio 301 is made with a minimum of 48% recycled plastic to support a climate positive world — We chose to embrace the speckled appearance that comes from the variability of recycled plastics. In addition to giving these plastics a new life, this also gives Brio 301 a unique, stylish look.

SHOW UP IN CLARITY Equip yourself with Brio 301, a 1080p webcam that presents you in the right angle and clear image quality for an engaging video experience. LOOK NATURAL IN LOW LIGHT RightLight 2 adjusts to compensate for challenging light conditions so you look natural. 70° dFOV frames you with just enough background space. SOUND LIKE YOU The mono noise-reducing mic captures and transmits your voice while suppressing background noise so you can be heard clearly. SPIN FOR INSTANT PRIVACY Easily spin the privacy shutter to completely block the camera when not in use. Spin again to reveal the lens when you’re ready for your next call.

MADE FOR MEETINGS Easily join a meeting using your preferred video meeting app. Brio 301 is compatible with most video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Zoom. GET MORE WITH LOGI TUNE Download the free Logi Tune desktop app for additional features that allow you to adjust the webcam to your preferences. Adjust color and image resolution. Take advantage of other features like automatic firmware updates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty solid, basic webcam
reviews.reviewText: It's small and pretty. It's easy to set up, just plug into your USB C port and it's good to go. The clamp could be much better though since it just relies on leaning against the back of your monitor as opposed to actually gripping on, so it will fall off if bumped. The ability to turn the camera off with the flip lid is also great for added security.The image and mic are both clear and I have had no issue so far.When you preview your image it will only show your image as mirrored and there is no way to change that view however, when you are actually using it, your image is not mirrored.Lastly, the booklet doesn't tell you, and it is actually quite hard to find, that Logitunes is the Logitech program that is compatible with the Brio 300 if you want to sync it to your email or calendar and even then it can only be connected to Outlook. However, that isn't a feature that seems necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish Neutral Pink Webcam with Impressive Photo Quality
reviews.reviewText: Boasting a stylish and neutral pink color, this webcam adds a touch of sophistication to any setup, with its shade resembling a delicate skin tone. Beyond its chic appearance, the adjustable base ensures a perfect fit on my monitor. A standout feature, however, is the webcam's remarkable photo quality. It captures images with impressive clarity, making it an ideal choice for virtual meetings. The blend of subtle elegance in its pink hue, adaptability with the adjustable base, and outstanding photo quality makes this webcam a visually pleasing and functionally reliable addition to any workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and easy to implement
reviews.reviewText: The camera is with good quality and very easy to implement to computer. But it can not be fixed/adhesive to monitor which make it loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little piece of equipment!
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research looking for a good quality product that is simple and relatively inexpensive. This is it! I'm so happy. Love love love the simple no hassle set-up and operation. Plus it's excellent quality at a great price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera quality on this product is far from stellar that being said you get what you pay for especially with electronics. I’ve had some issues with compatibility on zoom and other software but overall this is a decent starter camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised ...
reviews.reviewText: Just works very simple and clips onto the top of my monitor so I can now have video without having to remove my Macbook from clam shell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT a USB 3.0 device. A Type-C plug does not make it one.
reviews.reviewText: Technical folks might appreciate this detail.I own many Logitech peripherals and will continue to buy them. This Brio 301, like all the others, is well-designed, well-made, and works great, "plug & play" out of the box. It's just overpriced IMHO. I have some $20 generic 1080p cameras that produce an equal or better image.I needed a USB 3.0 camera and did not want to pay 2x for the Brio 4k. At the time of this review, there really only a handful of true USB 3.0 cameras out there, and the Brio 4k is actually one of the cheaper ones.The need came from the traffic on my Thunderbolt-3 Dock. I have repeated this test on Dell & Lenovo docks, and suspect it would recur on the others. A lot of dock traffic goes back to the computer on the USB 2.0 lanes--not just your keyboard & mouse. Most folks don't notice a performance degradation because it usually handles it pretty well. However, add a HD video stream to the traffic (any make/model HD webcam) and eventually the video stream becomes unstable. If I switch to a USB 3.0 camera like the Brio 4k or Dell UltraSharp 4k going into the dock, I get a crisp 4k image with no freezing or dropped frames because there's more than enough room on the USB 3.0 lanes back to the computer.Plug this Brio 301 into a root USB 3.x port on your computer and run USB Tree Viewer. You will see it is not a USB 3.0 device. The Type-C plug is just a plug, and while it does have much higher power & speed capabilities, few peripherals that use the plug actually use the USB 3.x speed. To be fair, outside of storage and video devices, they really don't need to and that keeps prices down. 1080p cameras generally perform just fine on the USB 2.0 bus, and the Brio 301 is no exception.I was hoping this would be the first true USB 3.0 1080p webcam for under $100, but I was let down. Logitech's description and answers to questions here should be corrected.

This unit worked perfectly. The shutter is a nice security feature. Light comes on if mic or video is accessed. Fits on low profile and small border PC monitor screens. Can be a little finicky getting the vertical angle right but stays once it's there.
Exactly what I was hoping for. The stand is sturdy enough to not wiggle when my desk is bumped. Logitech never fails.
Does what it’s supposed to do, has a good quality image.

reviews.reviewTitle: peu dispendieuse, jolie et très efficace
reviews.reviewText: J'aime beaucoup qu'elle soit en plastique recyclée (win pour la planète) qu'elle soit rose (win pour moi!) et qu'elle soit très abordable (win pour moi!) j'avais besoin d'une caméra pour les appels Teams, donc rien de fancy, pas nécessaire de tourner le prochain grand film du Festival de Cannes, cette caméra rempli très bien sa fonction. J'aurais normalement pris la Logitech Brio 500 (disponible en rose également) pour son profil un peu plus petit, mais la brio 300 était en spécial et la dimension de la caméra ne justifiait pas les 70$ supplémentaires pour la brio 500) Très bon achat!
Good camera, works fine in dark settings and in light.. didn't use the microphone on it but the image is good... only negative comment : it doesn't rotate.
